_source.immunity_markdown: death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious
_source.markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zombie Shambler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=423)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A zombie shambler is a slow-moving horror dangerous in larger groups.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Zombie Shambler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=423)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 340

**Perception** +0; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** -2

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A zombie is permanently slowed 1 and can’t use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 12 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +0 

**Will** +2 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

</row>

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

**Weaknesses**
positive 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7,
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning plus Grab

**Jaws** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Requirement** The zombie has a creature grabbed or restrained. **Effect** The zombie makes a jaws unarmed melee Strike against the grabbed or restrained creature with an attack modifier of +7 that deals 1d8+3 piercing damage.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-103" />

Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 13 Unspecific Lore : DC 11 Specific Lore : DC 8 Zombie Shambler Source Bestiary pg. 340 Perception +0; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +5 Str +3 Dex -2 Con +2 Int -5 Wis +0 Cha -2 Slow A zombie is permanently slowed 1 and can’t use reactions. --- AC 12 Fort +6 Ref +0 Will +2 HP 20 (negative healing) Immunities death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Weaknesses positive 5, slashing 5 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action fist +7, Damage 1d6+3 bludgeoning plus Grab Jaws Single Action (Attack) Requirement The zombie has a creature grabbed or restrained. Effect The zombie makes a jaws unarmed melee Strike against the grabbed or restrained creature with an attack modifier of +7 that deals 1d8+3 piercing damage.
